an8.14:4.1: “Aṭṭha ca, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅke desessāmi aṭṭha ca assadose, aṭṭha ca purisakhaḷuṅke aṭṭha ca purisadose.
an8.14:4.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an8.14:4.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an8.14:5.1: “Katame ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭha assakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca assadosā?
an8.14:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭikkamati, piṭṭhito rathaṃ pavatteti.
an8.14:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchā laṅghati, kubbaraṃ hanati, tidaṇḍaṃ bhañjati.
an8.14:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā rathīsāya satthiṃ ussajjitvā rathīsaṃyeva ajjhomaddati.
an8.14:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā ummaggaṃ gaṇhati, ubbaṭumaṃ rathaṃ karoti.
an8.14:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā laṅghati purimakāyaṃ paggaṇhati purime pāde.
an8.14:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā anādiyitvā sārathiṃ anādiyitvā patodalaṭṭhiṃ dantehi mukhādhānaṃ vidhaṃsitvā yena kāmaṃ pakkamati.
an8.14:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā neva abhikkamati no paṭikkamati tattheva khīlaṭṭhāyī ṭhito hoti.
an8.14:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā purime ca pāde saṃharitvā pacchime ca pāde saṃharitvā tattheva cattāro pāde abhinisīdati.
an8.14:12.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha assakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca assadosā.
an8.14:13.1: * Katame ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭha purisakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca purisadosā?
an8.14:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:13.3: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno ‘na sarāmī’ti asatiyā nibbeṭheti.
an8.14:13.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭikkamati, piṭṭhito rathaṃ vatteti;
an8.14:14.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:14.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno codakaṃyeva paṭippharati:
an8.14:14.3: ‘kiṃ nu kho tuyhaṃ bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena.
an8.14:14.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchā laṅghati, kubbaraṃ hanati, tidaṇḍaṃ bhañjati;
an8.14:15.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:15.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno codakasseva paccāropeti:
an8.14:15.3: ‘tvaṃ khosi itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, tvaṃ tāva paṭhamaṃ paṭikarohī’ti.
an8.14:15.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā rathīsāya satthiṃ ussajjitvā rathīsaṃyeva ajjhomaddati;
an8.14:16.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:16.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno aññenāññaṃ paṭicarati, bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmeti, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an8.14:16.3: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā ummaggaṃ gaṇhati, ubbaṭumaṃ rathaṃ karoti;
an8.14:17.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:17.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno saṅghamajjhe bāhuvikkhepaṃ karoti.
an8.14:17.3: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā laṅghati, purimakāyaṃ paggaṇhati purime pāde;
an8.14:18.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:18.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno anādiyitvā saṅghaṃ anādiyitvā codakaṃ sāpattikova yena kāmaṃ pakkamati.
an8.14:18.3: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā anādiyitvā sārathiṃ anādiyitvā patodalaṭṭhiṃ dantehi mukhādhānaṃ vidhaṃsitvā yena kāmaṃ pakkamati;
an8.14:19.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:19.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno ‘nevāhaṃ āpannomhi, na panāhaṃ āpannomhī’ti so tuṇhībhāvena saṃghaṃ viheṭheti.
an8.14:19.3: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā neva abhikkamati no paṭikkamati tattheva khīlaṭṭhāyī ṭhito hoti;
an8.14:20.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:20.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno evamāha:
an8.14:20.3: ‘kiṃ nu kho tumhe āyasmanto atibāḷhaṃ mayi byāvaṭā yāva idānāhaṃ sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī’ti.
an8.14:20.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā purime ca pāde saṃharitvā pacchime ca pāde saṃharitvā tattheva cattāro pāde abhinisīdati;
an8.14:20.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha purisakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca purisadosā”ti.
